flow-definition.description:
This job can help to check pod list under specified namespace and trigger specified command on selected pods in list
You can input the LabelSelector and FieldSelector to filter the pods

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: LabelSelector
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
Input the label selector for pod, or leave it as empty. Empty means will not do filter on return list
Sample:
group=demoqalive,component=demoqalivecrs-app

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: FieldSelector
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
Input FieldSelector to filter pod in list or leave it as empty. Empty means will not do filter on return list
Sample for list pod which is in running status:
status.phase=Running

org.biouno.unochoice.CascadeChoiceParame.name: Pods
org.biouno.unochoice.CascadeChoiceParame.description: Pods list, based on the input NameSpace / LabelSelector / FieldSelector

hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: Command
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.description:
Input the command you want to exec on target pod.
Sample command for check version of Pod /SETUP/bin/viewlabels.
